alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 5:00PM CDT until April 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR STONE...SOUTHEASTERN SEARCY...NORTHEASTERN VAN BUREN AND NORTHWESTERN CLEBURNE COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Old Lexington, or 7 miles north of Clinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Thola... Fairfield Bay Marina... Rocky Hill... Elba... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Old Lexington... Elberta... Blanchard Springs Campground... Leslie... Allison... Alco... Parma... Hanover... Rushing... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
